response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This item holds immense value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am willing to consider a transaction. Given its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I propose to sell it to you for $950,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between its true value and my desire to ensure a profitable outcome for both parties involved. I trust this offer will be favorable to you, allowing you to maximize the investment while also ensuring a satisfactory return for me. Please let me know if you require any further information or clarification about the product, and we can proceed with the details of the transaction.", "product_price": 950000}
